name: Food From The Sky
description:
Food From The Sky - is a casual game where you have to catch foods that fall from the sky. There is a good meal that raises your score counter, and there is a bad one that lowers. When you reach a certain number of food points, your difficulty level increases and the amount of falling food increases. The goal is to eat as much food as possible, and not to reach a negative number of food points, because then you will lose.



-Interest gameplay

-System of levels

-Perfect graphics and effects

-Pleasant music
